LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Larval.label: larval chaos slime
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Larval.description:
Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.

Chaos slime - under the influence of an unknown force from the outside, they began to fuse their bodies into something single.

They are the lowest and weakest form of chaos slimes.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Larval.tools.mouth.label: mouth
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Larval.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Adult.label: adult chaos slime
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Adult.description:
Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.

Chaos slime - under the influence of an unknown force from the outside, they began to fuse their bodies into something single.

Adult chaos slimes is the second stage in the chaos slimes fusion chain which yields a much larger, stronger and more resilient foe.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Adult.tools.mouth.label: mouth
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Adult.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Badass.label: Badass chaos slime
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Badass.description:
Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.

Chaos slime - under the influence of an unknown force from the outside, they began to fuse their bodies into something single.

Badass chaos slimes is the third stage in the chaos slimes fusion chain which yields a much larger, stronger and more resilient foe.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Badass.tools.mouth.label: mouth
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Badass.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_SuperBadass.label: Super Badass chaos slime
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_SuperBadass.description:
Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.

Chaos slime - under the influence of an unknown force from the outside, they began to fuse their bodies into something single.

Super Badass chaos slimes is the fourth stage in the chaos slimes fusion chain which yields a much larger, stronger and more resilient foe.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_UltimateBadass.label: Ultimate Badass chaos slime
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_UltimateBadass.description:
Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.

Chaos slime - under the influence of an unknown force from the outside, they began to fuse their bodies into something single.

Ultimate chaos slimes is the fifth stage in the chaos slimes fusion chain which yields a much larger, stronger and more resilient foe.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_UltimateBadass.comps.CompD: A chaos slime swallowed {PAWN_nameDef} whole! Kill the chaos slime before it digests {PAWN_nameDef}.
{PAWN_nameDef} emerged from the chaos slime's corpse.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Invincible.label: chaos slime the Invincible
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Invincible.description:
Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.

Chaos slime - under the influence of an unknown force from the outside, they began to fuse their bodies into something single.

Chaos slime the Invincible is the ultimate fusion stage of chaos slimes. It possesses unmatched statis and abilities.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlime_Invincible.comps.CompDevou: A chaos slime swallowed {PAWN_nameDef} whole! Kill the chaos slime before it digests {PAWN_nameDef}.
{PAWN_nameDef} emerged from the chaos slime's corpse.
LanguageData.OE_Returned.label: returned
LanguageData.OE_Returned.description: Returned is a resurrected corpse of Crimson Arachna Cultist. This corpse is fused with the armor and prototype of Amalgam Arachna Legs, which makes this creature extremely mobile and armored. It's the result of one of the first unsuccessful experiments of Crimson Arachna Cult in the artificial hybridization of the powers of Crimson Arachna.
LanguageData.OE_Returned.tools.left_spike.label: left spike
LanguageData.OE_Returned.tools.right_spike.label: right spike
LanguageData.OE_Returned.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_CyberArachna.label: Cyber Arachna
LanguageData.OE_CyberArachna.description: Cyber Arachna is a hybrid of Crimson Arachna Cultist with a mechanoid body. This creature is extremely durable and armored, but has a low movement speed. It's the result of one of the first unsuccessful experiments of Crimson Arachna Cult in the artificial hybridization of the powers of Crimson Arachna.
LanguageData.OE_CyberArachna.tools.head.label: head
